title: Bank business tepid in July as deposit growth slows
description: In July, bank business saw slower growth in both credit and deposits compared to last year, according to the Reserve Bank of India. Deposits rose 10.6 percent year-on-year while credit grew by 13.7 percent. Banks are being urged to focus more on deposit mobilisation to avoid potential liquidity issues due to reliance on non-retail deposits.
